text: Note: section, use series verbs infer generate information need hypothesis test. call output decision_sex_test , ’ll want change another name different test. recommended pattern response_predictor_test.Don’t forget set seed. using randomization permute values predictor variable order break association might exist data. allow us explore sampling distribution created assumption null hypothesis.get visualize step, leave number bins . code:
set.seed(9999)
decision_sex_test <- sex_discrimination %>%
    specify(decision ~ sex, success = "promoted") %>%
    hypothesize(null = "independence") %>%
    generate(reps = 1000, type = "permute") %>%
    calculate(stat = "diff in props", order = c("male", "female"))
decision_sex_test
decision_sex_test %>%
    visualize(bins = 9) +
    shade_p_value(obs_stat = obs_diff, direction = "two-sided")

set.seed(42)
melanoma_test <- Melanoma %>%
    specify(response = sex_fct, success = "female") %>%
    hypothesize(null = "point", p = 0.5) %>%
    generate(reps = 1000, type = "draw") %>%
    calculate(stat = "prop")
melanoma_test
